task.title: Subscribe to custom tags
task.shortdesc: prepares TimedMetadata objects for subscribed tags each time these objects are encountered in the content manifest.

taskbody.prereq: Before the playback starts, you must subscribe to the tags.

context.p: To be notified about custom tags in HLS manifests:

step.cmd: Set the custom ad tag names globally by passing an array that contains the custom tags to setSubscribedTags in MediaPlayerItemConfig.

info.note: You must include the # prefix when working with HLS streams.
